name: Vagrant Space Prototype
description:
The year is 20XX, after waking up from cryosleep, you find yourself on a derelict ship, trying to make your way back home..

A general prototype of the ship-fixing mechanics I intent on using in a project I am working on. I decided to upload it here mostly to get some feedback if it feels any good to play, and if you would like to see a  full-fledged version of the same idea.

Use your drone to help you repair your ever-breaking ship after the interstellar company voided your warranty for hyper space travel.

https://discord.gg/rDBXQaw8KS- our discord server for working on this
